titles.title: 106 What Grace O Lord And Beauty Shone

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
what grace O Lord and beauty shone
around Thy steps below
what patient love was seen
in all Thy life and death of woe

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
forever on Thy burdened heart
a weight of sorrow hung
yet no ungentle murmuring word
escaped Thy silent tongue

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
thy foes might hate despise revile
thy friends unfaithful prove
unwearied in forgiveness still
thy heart could only love

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
oh give us hearts to love like Thee
like Thee O lord to grieve
far more for other's sins than all
the wrongs that we receive

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
one with Thyself may every eye
in us Thy brethren see
the gentleness and grace that spring
from union Lord with Thee
